note.p: Death: At sea, off the coast of Cherbourg, France (05 August 1872)
Education: Secondary school, Troyes; Ecole Polytechnique, Paris (1836)
Career: Teacher of Geodesy, Ecole des Mines; Professor, Ecole Polytechnique; Engineer in chief, Corps des Mines; Director, Paris Observatory; drowned when the pleasure boat he was on capsized
Authority: Birth and death dates from DSB
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1875-1876 vol 24 pp vii-ix
